p: 2,6-dimethyl-4-(pentafluorothio)aniline ( 1d). A mixture of 2-bromo-6-methyl-4-(pentafluorothio)aniline (200 mg, 0.64 mmol), methylboronic acid (2.0 eq., 1.28 mmol), Pd(dppf)Cl 2.DCM (0.1 eq., 0.064 mmol), and Cs 2CO 3 (3.0 eq., 1.92 mmol) in 1,4-dioxane (1.7 mL) was stirred at 105 °C for 5 h. The mixture was diluted in EtOAc, washed with aq. NaHCO 3, dried over Na 2SO 4, and concentrated. The residue was purified by flash column chromatography on a silica gel (hexane:EtOAc = 15:1) to give the desired product 1d as a brown solid (119 mg, 75%). mp 205~206 °C; 1H-NMR (300 MHz, CDCl 3) δ 7.34 (s, 2H), 3.90 (s, 2H), 2.20 (s, 6H); 13C-NMR (100 MHz, CDCl3) δ 145.2, 144.1, 128.0, 126.5, 121.8, 120.7, 18.0; 19F-NMR (470 MHz, CDCl 3) δ 87.32 (p, 1F, J SF–SF4 = 149.9 Hz, SF), 64.88 (d, 4F, J SF4–SF = 149.8 Hz, SF 4); HRMS (EI) calcd. for C 8H 10F 5NS 247.0454, found 247.0451 (see Supplementary Materials).
